column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ da a otsia awɔtwe no
column3: Moses frɛɛ Aaron nye ne mbabanyin no

column2: "na ɔsee Aaron dɛ
column3: Fa nantwiba onyin a wɔdze bɛyɛ bɔn ho afɔr
column4: nye oguannyin a wɔdze bɛyɛ ɔhyew afɔr a wonndzii dzɛm

column2: "Na kasa kyerɛ Israelmba no dɛ
column3: Hom mfa apɔnkyenyin mbɛyɛ bɔn ho afɔr; na nantwiba nye eguambaa a hɔn beenu nyina woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia a wonndzii dzɛm

column2: "na ɔnantwinyin nye oguannyin mbɛyɛ asomdwee afɔr
column3: mfa mbɔ afɔr wɔ EWURADZE enyim; na edziban afɔr a wɔdze ngo afrɔw: na ndɛ na EWURADZE yi noho kyerɛ hom."

column2: "Na wɔdze dza Moses hyɛe no baa ehyiadzibuw no enyim: na mboanofo no nyinara twee bɛnee begyinaa EWURADZE enyim."
"Na Moses see dɛ
column3: Iyi nye adze a EWURADZE hyɛɛ dɛ hom nyɛ: na EWURADZE enyimnyam nyi noho nkyerɛ hom."

column2: "Na Moses see Aaron dɛ
column3: Twe bɛn afɔrmbukyia no ho
column4: na bɔ wo bɔn ho afɔr
column7: nye ɔman no: na fa ɔman no hɔn ayɛyɛdze bra
column8: na pata ma hɔn; dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛe no."

column2: "Nna Aaron twee bɛɛn afɔrmbukyia no ho
column3: na okum bɔn ho afɔr nantwiba no a ɔyɛ nankasa nedze no."

column2: "Na Aaron ne mbabanyin no dze bɔgya no kɛmaa no; na ɔdze ne nsatseaba bɔɔ bɔgya no mu
column3: na ɔdze kekaa afɔrmbukyia no ne mmbɛn no
column4: na ohuee bɔgya no guu afɔrmbukyia no ase:"

column2: "na bɔn ho afɔr no mu seradze no
column3: nye nsɛbɛ no
column5: ɔhyeew no wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do; dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no."

column2: "Na nam no nye nwoma no dze
column3: ɔdze gya hyeew no wɔ nseraban no ekyir."

column2: "Na okum ɔhyew afɔr no; na Aaron ne mbabanyin no dze bɔgya no kɛmaa no
column3: na ɔdze petsee afɔrmbukyia no do hyiae."

column2: "Na wɔdze ɔhyew afɔr no esinesin
column3: nye tsir no
column4: kɛmaa no: na ɔhyeew no wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do."

column2: "Na ɔhohoor ayamudze nye ntwɛr no ho
column3: na ɔhyeew no wɔ ɔhyew afɔr no do wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do."

column2: "Na ɔdze ɔman no hɔn ayɛyɛdze kɛmae
column3: na ɔfaa bɔn ho afɔr apɔnkye a ɔyɛ ɔman no dze no
column5: na ɔyɛɛ no bɔn ho afɔr

column2: "Na ɔdze edziban afɔr no kɛmae
column3: na ɔyɛɛ no dɛ mbrɛ mbra no tse no ara."

column2: "Na ɔdze edziban afɔr no kɛmae
column3: na ɔfaa mu ne nsapuw
column4: na ɔhyeew no wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do
column5: dze kaa anapa ɔhyew afɔr no ho."

column2: "Na eso okum nantwinyin nye oguannyin no asomdwee afɔr a ɔyɛ ɔman no dze no: na Aaron mbabanyin no dze bɔgya no kɛmaa no
column3: na ɔdze petsee afɔrmbukyia no do hyiae

column2: "na ɔnantwinyin nye oguannyin no seradze no; seradze dua no
column3: nye dza ɔkata ayamudze no ho

column2: "na wɔdze seradze no guu nyan no do
column3: na ɔhyeew seradze no wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do:"

column2: "na nyan no nye aserɛ nyimfa no Aaron towee dze yɛɛ ɔtow afɔr wɔ EWURADZE enyim; dɛ mbrɛ Moses hyɛe no."
"Na Aaron memaa ne nsa do wɔ ɔman no do
column3: na ohyiraa hɔn; na ɔbɔɔ bɔn ho afɔr nye ɔhyew afɔr

column2: "Na Moses nye Aaron kɛhɛɛn ehyiadzibuw no mu
column3: na wopuei
column4: na wohyiraa ɔman no; na EWURADZE enyimnyam yii noho kyerɛɛ ɔman no nyinara."

column2: "Na ogya fi EWURADZE enyim bae
column3: na ɔbɛhyeew afɔrmbukyia no do hyew afɔr nye seradze no: na ɔman no nyinara hunii no
column5: na wɔdze hɔn enyim butubutuuw famu."
